attributes.name: Ice Wraith Bane
attributes.magical_effects: Does 50 points of poison damage if the target is an Ice Wraith

attributes.name: Potion of Blood
attributes.magical_effects: Equivalent to feeding on human blood for vampires. Vampires heal 100 points of health.

attributes.name: Potion of Waterwalking
attributes.magical_effects: Walk on the surface of water for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Redwater Skooma
attributes.magical_effects: Slowed movement. Environment becomes red and purple. Sight becomes blurry.

attributes.name: Soul Husk Extract
attributes.magical_effects: Interrupts the Soul Drain effect in the Soul Cairn.

attributes.name: Stallion's Potion
attributes.magical_effects: Interrupts the Soul Drain effect in the Soul Cairn.

attributes.name: The White Phial
attributes.magical_effects: Contains an unlimited potion of your choice.

attributes.name: Vaermina's Torpor
attributes.magical_effects: Enter "The Dreamstride" for an unknown length of time.
